00017 #include <ulib/date.h>

00020 #include <openssl/x509.h>
00021 
00022 class UCertificate;
00023 
00029 class U_EXPORT UCrl {
00030 public:
00031 
00032         // Check for memory error
00033         U_MEMORY_TEST
00034 
00035         // Allocator e Deallocator
00036         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00037         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00038 
00043         UCrl(X509_CRL* _crl = 0) : crl(_crl)
00044                 {
00045                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCrl, "%p", _crl)
00046                 }
00047 
00056         static X509_CRL* readCRL(const UString& x, const char* format = 0);
00057 
00058         UCrl(const UString& x, const char* format = 0)
00059                 {
00060                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCrl, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x), format)
00061 
00062                 crl = readCRL(x, format);
00063                 }
00064 
00069         void clear()
00070                 {
00071                 U_TRACE(1, "UCrl::clear()")
00072 
00073                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00074 
00075                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(X509_CRL_free, "%p", crl);
00076 
00077                 crl = 0;
00078                 }
00079 
00080         ~UCrl()
00081                 {
00082                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCrl)
00083 
00084                 if (crl) clear();
00085                 }
00086 
00087         // VARIE
00088 
00089         bool isValid() const
00090                 {
00091                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::isValid()")
00092 
00093                 U_RETURN(crl != 0);
00094                 }
00095 
00096         X509_CRL* getCrl() const { return crl; }
00097 
00098         bool isUpToDate() const;
00099 
00100         static unsigned getRevokedSerials(X509_CRL* crl, long* revoked, unsigned sz);
00101                          unsigned getRevokedSerials(                                     long* revoked, unsigned sz) { return getRevokedSerials(crl, revoked, sz); }
00102 
00103         long hashCode() const
00104                 {
00105                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::hashCode()")
00106 
00107                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00108 
00109                 long hash = X509_NAME_hash(X509_CRL_get_issuer(crl));
00110 
00111                 U_RETURN(hash);
00112                 }
00113 
00118         static UString getFileName(X509_CRL* crl);
00119 
00120         UString getFileName() const { return getFileName(crl); }
00121 
00126         long getVersionNumber() const
00127                 {
00128                 U_TRACE(1, "UCrl::getVersionNumber()")
00129 
00130                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00131 
00132                 long version = U_SYSCALL(X509_CRL_get_version, "%p", crl);
00133 
00134                 U_RETURN(version);
00135                 }
00136 
00141         UString getSignature() const
00142                 {
00143                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::getSignature()")
00144 
00145                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00146 
00147                 UString signature( (const char*) crl->signature->data,
00148                                                                                                         crl->signature->length );
00149 
00150                 U_RETURN_STRING(signature);
00151                 }
00152 
00157         const char* getLastUpdate() const
00158                 {
00159                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::getLastUpdate()")
00160 
00161                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00162 
00163                 ASN1_UTCTIME* utctime = X509_CRL_get_lastUpdate(crl);
00164 
00165                 U_RETURN((const char*)utctime->data);
00166                 }
00167 
00172         const char* getNextUpdate() const
00173                 {
00174                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::getNextUpdate()")
00175 
00176                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00177 
00178                 ASN1_UTCTIME* utctime = X509_CRL_get_nextUpdate(crl);
00179 
00180                 U_RETURN((const char*)utctime->data);
00181                 }
00182 
00187         static UString getIssuer(X509_CRL* crl, bool ldap = false);
00188 
00189         UString getIssuer(bool ldap = false) const { return getIssuer(crl, ldap); }
00190 
00191         UString getIssuerForLDAP() const { return getIssuer(true); }
00192 
00199         bool isIssued(UCertificate& ca) const;
00200 
00205         UString getEncoded(const char* format = "PEM") const;
00206 
00207         static bool isEqual(X509_CRL* a, X509_CRL* b)
00208                 {
00209                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::isEqual(%p,%p)", a, b)
00210 
00211                 int rc = U_SYSCALL(X509_CRL_cmp, "%p,%p", a, b);
00212 
00213                 U_RETURN(rc == 0);
00214                 }
00215 
00216         bool operator==(const UCrl& c) const { return  isEqual(crl, c.crl); }
00217         bool operator!=(const UCrl& c) const { return !isEqual(crl, c.crl); }
00218

00220 
00221         UString print() const;
00222 
00223         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UCrl& c);

00225 #ifdef DEBUG
00226         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00227 #endif

00230         X509_CRL* crl;
00231 
00232 private:
00233         UCrl(const UCrl&)            {}
